overview:
• Cloud Computing and Large Scale Distributed Data Processing (Hadoop/MapReduce,Pig, HBase and related products). Amazon Web Services (AWS) i.e. S3, EC2, EMR,…
  • Mobile (Native iPhone/iOS and Android i.e. Objective-C and Java) Application Development. Mobile Web Application Development. Mobile Business Development.
  • Team Building and Leadership, Engineering Management
  • Java 2 Enterprise Programming (Struts, Spring, Hibernate, Jersey etc.)
  • Data Warehousing (ETL, Dimensional Modeling, SQL mostly on Oracle Database), worked with transactional SQL Databases (Oracle), Graph/NOSQL databases
  • Software Architecture & Development (Agile Development and XP)
